title: Dear White People
synopsis: Students of color navigate the daily slights and slippery politics of life at an Ivy League college that's not nearly as "post-racial" as it thinks.
cast: Brandon P. Bell, Logan Browning, Antoinette Robertson

episodes.title: Chapter I
episodes.synopsis: As college radio host Samantha White leads the outcry over a blackface party on campus, a revelation about her love life puts her in an awkward spot.

episodes.title: Chapter II
episodes.synopsis: Buoyed by his front-page story on the party, shy reporter Lionel begins to come out of his shell and embrace his true identity.

episodes.title: Chapter III
episodes.synopsis: Golden boy Troy schmoozes his way around campus at his dad's behest, campaigning for student body president. But his smile hides nagging doubts.

episodes.title: Chapter IV
episodes.synopsis: As Coco gears up for an exclusive soiree, a fight with Sam stirs up memories of their friendship -- and the differences that drove them apart.

episodes.title: Chapter V
episodes.synopsis: Friends drag Reggie out on the town to stop him from brooding over the revolution and Sam's new beau. But the night takes a harrowing turn.

episodes.title: Chapter VI
episodes.synopsis: Shell-shocked, Sam and company plan a protest against the campus police, while Reggie finds his own way to process the ordeal.

episodes.title: Chapter VII
episodes.synopsis: Picking up on the chemistry between Sam and Reggie, Gabe obsesses over the state of his relationship -- and makes a startling confession to Joelle.

episodes.title: Chapter VIII
episodes.synopsis: To show just how pervasive Winchester's race problems are, Lionel sets out to write a feature on Troy and makes some unexpected discoveries.

episodes.title: Chapter IX
episodes.synopsis: Coco jumps at the chance to join Troy at a party for wealthy donors, but the evening leaves her questioning his priorities.

episodes.title: Chapter X
episodes.synopsis: With tensions running high before the town hall, Sam tries to patch up her relationship, Coco steals Troy's thunder, and Lionel makes a bold move.
